body.p: Under IAS 8 Net Profit or Loss for the Period, Fundamental Errors and Changes in Accounting Policies, a change in accounting policies from one model to the other model should be made only if the change will result in a more appropriate presentation of events or transactions. The Board concluded that this is highly unlikely to be the case for a change from the fair value model to the cost model and paragraph 25 31 of the Standard reflects this conclusion.
